column4: Wow... I'm surprised how little useful information is there about this problem
So, is there anyone who can help?
I can't install the Creative X_Fi driver
It makes error in make - it says that some of the files are missing, but they are not missing
pastebin the output of the command please?
I'm somewhat new to linux... How to do that?
the error is that there's errors in the commands within files, so the files might be corrupt, verify the version of the driver
About corrupt files... I don't know how can that be - I downloaded them from creative's main site
do the have drivers for Ubuntu, and not just "linux"?
I did everything I know so far... followed the read me - it had only type make - that's the first step...
then i don't know what to tell you
